text: I'm pretty proficient in PHP, but want to try something new.
I'm also know a bit of Python, enough to do the basics of the basics, but haven't used in a web design type situation.
I've just written this, which works:

code:
#!/usr/bin/python

def main():
    print "Content-type: text/html"
    print
    print "<html><head>"
    print "<title>Hello World from Python</title>"
    print "</head><body>"
    print "Hello World!"
    print "</body></html>"

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

text: Thing is, that this seems pretty cumbersome.
Without using something huge like django, what's the best way to write scripts that can process get and post?
